name: esnbang
description: An application made to gather all ESN information.

scripts.package-windows: electron-packager . ESNbang! --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --prune=true --icon=assets/img/icons/star.ico --appCopyright="ESN International - All rights reserved" --overwrite
scripts.package-mac: electron-packager . ESNbang! --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --prune=true --icon=assets/img/icons/star.icns --appCopyright="ESN International - All rights reserved" --overwrite
scripts.package-linux: electron-packager . ESNbang! --platform=linux --arch=ia32 --prune=true --appCopyright="ESN International - All rights reserved" --overwrite
